backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with OKLCH color variables and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Press Start 2P font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component centering the ReactionGameScreen in the viewport.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Centralized paths for the two game images used in idle and reaction states.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Timing configuration for delays, overlays, and penalty durations.
frontend/src/game/copy.ts: Intro text constants reused across game screens.
frontend/src/game/domToPng.ts: Utility converting DOM elements to PNG blobs using foreignObject and canvas.
frontend/src/game/pixelStyles.ts: Exports shared pixel-art themed Tailwind class presets for typography, cards, overlays, buttons, and status colors.
frontend/src/game/ReactionGameScreen.tsx: Main game UI handling game state transitions, image display, overlays, and navigation to result/share preview screens.
frontend/src/game/ResultScreen.tsx: Result view showing reaction time, performance message, and buttons for replay and sharing.
frontend/src/game/share.ts: Implements image sharing via the Web Share API, returning structured success or error results.
frontend/src/game/SharePreviewScreen.tsx: Share preview card rendering the result image, creating PNG snapshots, and showing screenshot instructions when sharing fails.
frontend/src/game/useReactionGame.ts: Provides a React hook managing the reaction game's state machine, timing logic, penalties, and transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity, and status states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and winter-themed OKLCH color variables plus background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including OKLCH color tokens, pixel font, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, issues, and planned features for the reaction game and share workflow.
